name: WeddingUp Frontend Context Injection
description: Condensed context for AI-assisted frontend development of the WeddingUp app — a modern, emotionally intelligent wedding-planning platform inspired by ClickUp and Notion.

context.purpose: Guide Copilot or any AI assistant in making frontend design and UI decisions consistent with the WeddingUp brand and design philosophy.

visual_style.layout: clean, card-based interface with fixed navbar and contextual sidebar
visual_style.motion: gentle ease-in-out transitions, 150-250ms animations, fade-slide page changes

typography.heading: Playfair Display or Cormorant Garamond (serif)
typography.contrast: Bold serif headers (600-700 weight) with light body (300-400 weight)

buttons.style: rounded-lg, minimal shadows, primary blush with gold hover

cards.style: white/porcelain background, subtle border, soft shadow

forms.style: rounded inputs, lavender focus border, teal success, rosewood error

development_principles: Maintain atomic component hierarchy (atoms → molecules → organisms)
Keep logic minimal in frontend; delegate data ops to Supabase/API routes
Document all components with prop definitions and usage examples
Comment design intent, not redundant code
definition_of_done: Documented and tested for layout consistency
